mapper.insert: insert into user_tb(username, password, salt, name, email, contact, profile, created_at) values(#{username}, #{password}, #{salt}, #{name}, #{email}, #{contact}, #{profile}, now())
mapper.update: update user_tb set password=#{password}, salt = #{salt}, email = #{email}, contact = #{contact} where id = #{id}
mapper.select: select * from user_tb where username = #{username} and password = #{password}
select salt from user_tb where username = #{username}

select distinct u.id, enterprise_name from user_tb u left join user_skill_tb us on u.id = us.user_id left join recruitment_skill_tb rs on us.skill=rs.skill join recruitment_post_tb r on r.id=rs.recruitment_id left join enterprise_tb e on e.id = r.enterprise_id where u.id = #{id};
